content: **almond ridge crochet bauble pattern** elevate your holiday decor with the elegant almond ridge bauble this crochet ornament features textured ridges created with post stitches giving it a striking and sophisticated design its unique texture adds dimension and charm to your christmas tree making it a perfect addition to your festive decorations or a thoughtful handmade gift ideal for those who appreciate modern and eye-catching patterns this bauble is both timeless and festive > watch the full video tutorial here 1 > get the free pattern on my blog here 2 happy crocheting 1 https //youtu be/zgytqqaqdlm 2 https //spottedhorsedesignco com/crochet-almond-ridge-bauble/
